thread.title: This adorable pic of AbRam from his playtime will melt your hearts!
thread.title_full: This adorable pic of AbRam from his playtime will melt your hearts!

author: Bulbul Sharma
title: This adorable pic of AbRam from his playtime will melt your hearts!
text:
January 7, 2017 Bulbul Sharma 8818 reads 2 comments 
You canâ€™t help but agree that AbRam Khan is one of the most adorable star kids. The little one has been ruling our hearts ever since his pics have started to surface on the Internet and is, in fact, a hit on social media. 
Now the latest click to have appeared on Instagram is again a gem and will surely make you go aww-ing with his antics. 
The recent pic shows the cutesy enjoying his playtime much without bothering about the click! 
And look at that innocent face you guys!
